column2: "Na mboanofo no nyinara memaa hɔn ndze do
column3: na wɔkekaa mu; na ɔman no suu anadwe no."

column2: "Na Israelmba no nyinara hwinhwiin Moses nye Aaron ho: na mboanofo no nyinara see hɔn dɛ
column3: Ka hɛn nko a nkyɛ Nyankopɔn maa yewuwui wɔ Egypt asaase do! Anaa sar yi do ha ara mpo
column4: ka hɛn nko a nkyɛ Nyankopɔn maa yewuwui!"

column2: "Na ebɛn ntsi na EWURADZE dze hɛn reba asaase yi do
column3: dɛ yɛmbɔtotɔr nkrantsee ano? Hɛn yernom nye hɛn mbofraba bɛyɛ afonam: ana onnye mma hɛn dɛ yɛbɛsan akɔ Egypt bi a?"

column2: "Na wɔsesee hɔnho dɛ
column3: Wɔmma yɛnhyɛ ɔpanyin
column4: na yɛnsan nkɔ Egypt."

column2: "Nna Moses nye Aaron dze hɔn enyim butubutuuw famu wɔ Israelmba mboanofo bagua no nyinara enyim."
"Na Nun ne babanyin Josua nye Jefune ne babanyin Kaleb a wofi hɔn a wɔkɛseraa asaase no mu no
column3: sunsuaan hɔn ntar mu:"

column2: "na wɔkasaa kyerɛɛ Israelmba mboanofo no nyinara dɛ
column3: Asaase a yetwaa mu kɔree kɛserae no
column4: ɔyɛ asaase pa mbordo."

column2: "Sɛ yɛsɔ EWURADZE enyi a
column3: ɔno ɔdze hɛn bodu asaase no do
column4: na ɔdze ama hɛn; asaase a numfonsu nye ewo pem do."

column2: "EWURADZE do etua ara nko na mma hom nntsew
column3: nkyii so mma hom nnsuro asaase no do nkorɔfo no; na wɔyɛ edziban ma hɛn: hɔn akataman efi hɔn do
column4: na hɛn dze EWURADZE nye hɛn wɔ hɔ: mma wonnsuro hɔn."

column2: "Na mboanofo no nyinara kaa dɛ wonsiw Josua na Kaleb abo. Na EWURADZE enyimnyam puee ehyiadzibuw no mu kyerɛɛ Israelmba no nyinara."
"Na EWURADZE see Moses dɛ
column3: Ɔman yi rubu me enyimtsia ekodu dabɛn? Na dabɛn na wɔrenngye me nndzi
column4: wɔ nsɛnkyerɛdze a mayɛ wɔ hɔn mu nyinara mu no ekodu?"

column2: "Medze owuyarba mobɔbɔ hɔn
column3: na masɛɛ hɔn
column4: na medze wo mayɛ ɔman kɛse a ɔwɔ dzin sen hɔn."

column2: "Na Moses see dɛ
column3: Ɔno Egyptfo bɛtse; na ɔwo dze wo tum na edze eyi ɔman yi efi hɔn mu;"

column2: "na wɔbɛka akyerɛ asaase yi do atsefo: wɔatse dɛ ɔwo EWURADZE ewɔ ɔman yi mu; na ɔwo EWURADZE wohu wo enyim nye enyim
column3: na wo mununkum gyina hɔn do
column4: na ɔwo na idzi hɔn enyim

column2: "Afei sɛ iku ɔman yi dɛ nyimpa kor a
column3: ɔno amanaman a wɔatse wo nka no bɛka dɛ
column5: "Osiandɛ EWURADZE enntum dɛ ɔdze ɔman yi kɔ asaase a ɔkaa hɔn ho ntam no do no
column6: ntsi na oeku hɔn wɔ sar no do no."

column2: "Na afei
column3: mepa wo kyɛw
column4: ma EWURADZE no tum nyɛ kɛse
column10: na bem bi na onnkobu ɔfɔdzinyi no; ɔdze egyanom hɔn emumuyɛ hwɛ mba
column11: kodu ebusuasantsen ebiasa nye anan do."

column2: "Mepa wo kyɛw
column3: fa ɔman yi hɔn emumuyɛ fir hɔn dɛ mbrɛ w’adɔyɛ ne kɛse tse
column4: na dɛ mbrɛ ɔwo dze efir ɔman yi

column2: "Na EWURADZE see dɛ
column3: Medze akyɛ dɛ mbrɛ w’asɛm tse no:"

column2: "mbom nokwar ara
column3: dɛ metse ase
column4: na dɛ EWURADZE enyimnyam bɛhyɛ asaase nyinara ma yi;"

column2: "osiandɛ nyimpa nyina a woehu m’enyimnyam
column3: nye me nsɛnkyerɛdze a meyɛe wɔ Egypt nye sar no do no
column4: naaso wɔasɔ me ahwɛ mpɛn du nye yi

column2: "ampaara wonnkohu asaase a mekaa ho ntam mekyerɛɛ hɔn egyanom no
column3: nkyii so hɔn mu biara a obu me enyimtsia no runnhu:"

column2: "na m’akowaa Kaleb dze
column3: osiandɛ ɔwɔ sunsum bi so wɔ no mu
column4: na oedzi m’ekyir koraa no ntsi
column5: medze no mubodu asaase a ɔkɔr do no do; na n’asefo afa."

column2: "Afei Amalekfo nye Keenanfo tse ɔbɔn no mu: ɔkyena hom ndan
column3: na hom ntu nkɔ sar no do wɔ Mbɛw Po kwan do."

column2: "Na EWURADZE kasaa kyerɛɛ Moses nye Aaron dɛ
column4: "Dabɛn na memma mboanofo bɔn yi a wohwinhwin tsia me yi kwan ma onkodu? Israelmba hɔn ehwinhwin a wohwinhwin tsia me no matse."

column2: "Se hɔn dɛ
column3: Metse ase yi
column4: EWURADZE na ɔse
column5: ampaara dɛ mbrɛ hom akasa wɔ m’asomu no

column2: "sar yi do ara na hom efun bɛdeda; nye hɔn a wɔkaan hɔn wɔ hom mu no nyinara
column3: dɛ mbrɛ hom dodow nyina tse
column4: ofi hɔn a woedzi mfe eduonu nye ekyir do no a woehwinhwin etsia me no
column6: "ampaara hom runndu asaase a memaa me nsa do mekyerɛɛ dɛ mebɛma hom atsena do no do

column2: "Mbom hom mbofraba a hom see dɛ wɔbɛyɛ afonam no
column3: hɔn na medze hɔn bɔkɔ do
column4: na wobohu asaase a hom apow no."

column2: "Na hom dze
column3: sar yi do ara na hom efun bɛdeda."

column2: "Na hom mba ayɛ aworamafo wɔ sar no do mfe eduanan
column3: na wɔasoa hom ndwamanyɛ
column4: ekodu dɛ hom efun bɛsa wɔ sar no do."

column2: "Nda a hom dze kɛseraa asaase no
column3: no dodow mbrɛ ɔtse no
column4: mekyerɛ adaduanan na da kor nye afe kor
column7: na hom ehu mbrɛ me pa tse."

column2: "Emi EWURADZE na maka
column3: ampaara iyi na medze bɛyɛ mboanofo bɔn yi nyinara a woedzi ehyia etsia me yi: sar yi do ara na wɔbɛsa
column4: na hɔ na wobowuwu."

column2: "Na mbanyin no a Moses somaa hɔn ma wɔkɛseraa asaase no a wɔsanee bae
column3: na wɔmaa mboanofo no nyinara hwinhwinii tsiaa me no
column4: dɛ wɔdze asaase no ho atsenka bɔn bae no
column6: "mekyerɛ mbanyin no a wɔdze asaase no ho atsenka bɔn bae no
column7: wowuu owuyar wu wɔ EWURADZE enyim."

column2: "Mbom Nun ne babanyin Josua
column3: nye Jefune ne babanyin Kaleb
column4: na wonyaa nkwa wɔ mbanyin a wɔkɔree kɛseraa asaase no mu."

column2: "Na Moses kaa nsɛm yi kyerɛɛ Israelmba no nyinara: na ɔman no gyaam kɛsenara."
"Na wɔsoɛɛr ahanamakye
column3: na wɔfowee kɔr bepɔw no etsifi
column4: dɛ
column6: yɛbɔfow akɔ beebi mbrɛ EWURADZE abɔ ho anohoba no: na yɛayɛ bɔn."

column2: "Na Moses see dɛ
column3: Ɔyɛ dɛn ntsi na afei hom to EWURADZE mbrasɛm yi
column4: na iyi dze ɔrennyɛ yie?"

column2: "Mma hom mmfow nnkɔ
column3: na EWURADZE nnyi hom mu; mma hom aanntotɔr wɔ hom atamfo enyim."

column2: "Na Amalekfo nye Keenanfo wɔ hom enyim hɔ
column3: na hom bɔtotɔr wɔ nkrantsee ano: osiandɛ hom asan efi EWURADZE ekyir ntsi EWURADZE so rinndzi hom ekyir."

column2: "Na wotsitsii hɔn enyiwa ho ara dɛ wɔrofow akɔ bepɔw no etsifi: naaso EWURADZE n’ahyɛmudaka na Moses dze
column3: woemmfi nseraban no mu emmfi."

column2: "Nna Amalekfo
column3: nye Keenanfo a wɔtse bepɔw no do no sianee bae bokunkum hɔn na wɔbɔɔ hɔn petsee araa kodur Horma."
